subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,

He wasn't saying that about people who go graveyards though. He was saying =
that about people who automatically think all graveyards are haunted, which=
 is why he called these types "Hollywoodistic".

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: James W. Hyslope 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thur=
sday, May 14, 2009 5:55 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,





  =
Well I guess I am really directing this to Frank since he recently said tha=
t people that go to grave yards have some "hollywoodistic" type of "lost" m=
ind set :) And I did kind of "hint" that the Boxes are BS (they don't work =
for me) but my words were more a of a PLAY on anothers "emotion" (his) so h=
e would feel singled out....as he did when he put a LABEL on the people tha=
t "do" go to grave yards. And to call me "another seriouse researcher" is j=
ust plain argumentive, as it seems to look like that is his only way to exp=
ress himself.....As for going to a "moldy dark besement next" I do recall t=
hat is where HE said he does his research :) Sheeesh......--- In EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
  >
  > So you'r=
e saying the boxes are BS, and one has to use the "pure" methods?
  > Maybe=
 you should try some moldy dark besement next. Sheeesh, yet another
  > "se=
rious researcher"!
  > 
  > F-S
  > 
  > On Thu, May 14, 2009 at 12:04 PM, =
James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@...>wrote:
  > 
  > >
  > >
  > > I for one am=
 new at this...but doesn't mean I take this field very lightly.
  > > I hav=
e recorded once (so far) in a Cemetery...and I took the whole idea
  > > "s=
eriously", and with RESPECT. I can say for a FACT--that the voices I
  > > =
receive are "genuine" and not audible before playback...that to me is more
=
  > > desirable (and credible) than some that take "bits and pieces" of a r=
adio
  > > program to try and place the information into a "question" or "a=
nswer" then
  > > try and sell (my unique) way of reaching the unseen. And =
for the 2 weeks
  > > that I have been doing this...I seem to have gotten s=
ome amazing results
  > > with my "recorder" type technique. I am getting p=
layful spirits, sadness,
  > > needy voices, anger, laughter, my first name=
 spoken, possibly contacted my
  > > mother twice (unless is a trickster sp=
irit)...so to say "someone" does this
  > > in a form (that others don't ap=
prove)?? None of us are experts yet...so we
  > > will look for ANYTHING to=
 try and find the correct "angle" that works for us
  > > :) Even if it inc=
ludes an old Cemetery or working off the "Broadcast Band
  > > Radio Waves"=
 to shack up some type of sentence. I don't know...who has more
  > > "thro=
w away" audio?? I know ALL of my EVP is "unique".....I for one have
  > > t=
ried the "radio" type of EVP. I tried 2 Shack Mods...no joy here people.
  =
> > For me "I saw it at face value" after just a few minutes. I don't mean =
to
  > > offend. But I didn't step "first". Now who can say (for certain) W=
HO has the
  > > better form? What ever gets us closer to ourselves, and ou=
r lost FRIEND'S.
  > > That's ALL that matters man :) PS...I am a 46 year o=
ld male from Iowa. I
  > > have died and went to the tunnel (when I was 18)=
...was told "not my time to
  > > go" by a male voice that echoed (in the d=
arkness). I have seen 3 UFO's in V
  > > formation (during Heavens Gate) *2=
nd comet of that year (here in Iowa) I
  > > have seen 1 "shadow" person (t=
ake 1 step and vanish) touched a ghost (snuck
  > > up on it)...got a burn =
on tip of my finger where I reached out to touch top
  > > of it's head (en=
tity was small like child). I have developed 1 xray plate
  > > with my fin=
ger tips to make multiple white spots in the film-over 20 spots
  > > (nava=
l medical officer was angry when he saw them) hahaha...he didn't know I
  >=
 > did it when his back was turned :) Lot's of fun out here Guy's (and GALS=
)
  > > let's try and not point fingers now.....Knowbody should feel like t=
hey are
  > > singled out here...like I said "none of us "here" have ALL th=
e answers". So
  > > I'm not a total "Newbie"...but I will try a grace yard=
 again someday. And I
  > > would hope that people will respect me as well =
as I...of those IN that Grave
  > > Yard. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <E=
VP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "April
  > > Abercrombie" <april@> wrote:

woodism I think. I record in my
  > > basement.
  > > >
  > > > F-S
